info.title: Distributor App API
info.description: API documentation for the Distributor App

get.description: Get app theme settings including colors and fonts
Get app configuration including access permissions and general settings
Get company details including address, contact info, and social links
Check if app update is required or available. This is a public endpoint that does not require authentication.

parameters.name: current_version
parameters.description: Current app version installed on device (e.g., 1.0.0)

update_required.description: True if current version is below minimum required version

update_available.description: True if a newer version is available

update_url.description: URL to app store for update

post.description: Authenticate a user and return an access token
Register a new user
Logout the authenticated user

get.description: Get details of the authenticated user
Returns the authenticated user's shopping cart items

post.description: Add a product to the authenticated user's cart

put.description: Update the quantity of a cart item

delete.description: Remove an item from the cart

get.description: Get the number of items in the cart

post.description: Generate a proforma invoice from the cart items

delete.description: Remove all items from the cart

get.description: Returns list of categories with pagination

post.description: Returns category data

get.description: Returns category data
Returns all data needed for the home screen including categories, featured products, and user-specific data
Returns list of media items with pagination

post.description: Returns media data

get.description: Returns media data
Returns the authenticated user's proforma invoices

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by status (draft, sent, paid, cancelled)

get.description: Returns the details of a specific proforma invoice
Download the proforma invoice as PDF

post.description: Add all items from a proforma invoice back to the cart

get.description: Get list of notifications for the authenticated user

parameters.name: unread_only
parameters.description: Filter to show only unread notifications

post.description: Mark a specific notification as read
Mark all notifications for the authenticated user as read

get.description: Get the count of unread notifications for the authenticated user

post.description: Send a push notification to a specific user (Admin only)
Send a push notification to all users in a group (Admin only)
Register or update FCM device token for push notifications

get.description: Get Firebase notification statistics (Admin only)
Returns list of pages with pagination

post.description: Returns page data

get.description: Returns page data

post.description: Send password reset link to user's email
Reset password using token received via email
Verify if a password reset token is valid

get.description: Returns list of permissions with pagination

post.description: Returns permission data

get.description: Returns permission data
Returns list of products with pagination

post.description: Returns product data

get.description: Returns detailed product data including main photo, gallery, related products, wishlist status, and user-specific pricing
Search products by name or description
Get all products in a specific category
Get all products in a specific subcategory
Get all subcategories in a specific category
Returns the authenticated user's profile data

put.description: Update the authenticated user's profile data

post.description: Upload or update the authenticated user's avatar

delete.description: Permanently delete the authenticated user's account. This action cannot be undone. All user data including cart items, wishlist, and notifications will be deleted.

get.description: Returns list of proforma invoices with pagination

post.description: Returns proforma invoice data

get.description: Returns proforma invoice data
Returns list of roles with pagination

post.description: Returns role data

get.description: Returns role data
Returns list of settings with pagination

post.description: Returns setting data

get.description: Returns setting data

get.summary: Get list of shopping cart items
get.description: Returns list of shopping cart items with pagination

post.description: Returns shopping cart item data

get.description: Returns shopping cart item data

put.description: Returns updated shopping cart item data

get.description: Returns list of sub categories with pagination

post.description: Returns sub category data

get.description: Returns sub category data
Returns list of users

post.description: Returns user data

get.description: Returns user data
Returns list of user groups with pagination

post.description: Returns user group data

get.description: Returns user group data

get.summary: Get list of user group members
get.description: Returns list of user group members with pagination

post.description: Returns user group member data

get.description: Returns user group member data

put.description: Returns updated user group member data

get.description: Returns the authenticated user's wishlist with product details

post.description: Add a product to the authenticated user's wishlist

delete.description: Remove a product from the authenticated user's wishlist

get.summary: Check if product is in wishlist
get.description: Check if a specific product is in the authenticated user's wishlist

post.description: Add a product from wishlist to cart and optionally remove from wishlist

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Product ID to move to cart

remove_from_wishlist.description: Remove from wishlist after adding to cart (default: true)

400.description: Product out of stock or insufficient quantity

delete.description: Remove all items from the authenticated user's wishlist
